name: My Pet Puppy 3D
overview: Nine of the cutest puppies ever seen make their way to your Nintendo 3DS in this adorable pet simulation game. You play as a novice trainer and teach these loveable scamps how to sit, beg, roll over, jump, and more. Play with 8 adorable breeds (and one loveable mutt) all in 3D Learn to become an expert puppy trainer at the puppy kindergarten Take care of puppies at the puppy kindergarten by meeting their owners' training and care requests Practice training your own puppy with fun and challenging rhythm-based mini games, then take tests to prove your expertise Purchase adorable accessories and fun toys at the pet shop
